Package com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.controller

package com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.controller
This package contains all the Controller classes which handle web requests from the web application
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project
    This package holds the Application class, which runs this Spring Application
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.model
    This package contains the main entities for the application to function
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.repository
    This package holds the Repository classes, which are responsible for all persistence operations
    com.fdmgroup.spring.timothy_chai_ecommerce_project.service
    This package contains all Service classes which provide business logic in managing application classes
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CartController
    This class is the controller responsible for handling all cart-related requests, including adding to the cart, removing from the cart, and checking out
    CustomerController
    This class is the customer controller that handles all the requests related to the customer.
    ProductController
    This class is the controller for the product management system.
